article.title: Cosmic rays, anti-helium, and an old navy spotlight

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate predicted flux of anti-helium (He3bar) at a rigidity of 10 GV?
Which anti-particle flux measurement by AMS02 is consistent with secondary production as indicated in the figure?
What does the thick line represent in the graph showing the observed pbar/p ratio vs. rigidity?
choices: Secondary antiproton flux prediction with benchmark cross sections
Contribution of solar modulation to antiproton flux

multiple_choice_question.text: What general trend is observed for both B2 and B3 in relation to the HBT radius (R)?
choices: B2 and B3 are independent of R
B2 and B3 decrease with increasing R
B2 and B3 increase with increasing R

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the estimated range for B3pp based on HBT data primarily depend on?
choices: The range of plausible HBT radii (R) for pp collisions
The transverse mass (mt) of the produced anti-helium nucleus
The center-of-mass energy (√s) of the pp collision
The phase space correction factor R(x)
